body:
Ha, this is a classic mistake that hardly ever causes an actual problem - check if a file exists, and then immediately do something that fails if it's created/deleted since the check.

`.makedirs_p()` does look like the right fix. Do you want to make a PR?

You should also report it against the independent pickleshare package, which appears to have the same flaw: https://github.com/vivainio/pickleshare/blob/master/pickleshare.py#L61 . We're hoping to get rid of our bundled copy and depend on that in the future, but we're waiting for a new release before we do.

nice! will prepare the PR! i usually get the most unlikely errors :)

sent not from my computer
